channel.title: Vegemite
channel.description:
A question for all the Aussies, Black Mesa fans, developers & moderators:
Do you come from the land down under? How do you like your Vegemite? What exactly does it taste like, is it an acquired taste? Should you spread it thick on a slice of bread? Or spread it thinner? Does it taste anywhere like Marmite? Do you hate Marmite?

item.title: Vegemite
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
How Vegemite is made, for those who don’t know.

The XXXX Brewery (beer), after fermentation, send the yeast up to Bundaberg to the Bundaberg Rum Distillery, where they then use the yeast to make run, once they are done with it, they send what is left to the Vegemite factory, where it is turned into Vegemite.

It is a current aussie joke, as far as I know, to convince tourists to put a lot of it on a slice of toast when giving it their first taste, just so you can see their face twist around when they chew it.

If you want to enjoy, you should be spreading it paper thin. My personal fav way to have it is the same as Brokenfridge, but that said, I don’t eat breakfast and thus havent had it in years.

Read full topic

item.title: Vegemite
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I met a man in Brussels
Six foot four, and full of muscle
I said “do you speak-a my language?”
He just smiled and gave me a Vegimite sandwich,
And he said “are you come from a land down undah?”

I’ve been playing a lot of Saints Row 2 in the past few months, and that song is awesome.
